title: Jeremiah 1-20 Part 1 • Dr. John Hilton III • Oct. 10 - 16
description:
How does the Book of Jeremiah connect with the Book of Mormon? Dr. John Hilton III examines the relationship of the Book of Jeremiah to the Book of Mormon, its chronology, and how the prophet Jeremiah can lead us to Jesus Christ.

Please rate and review the podcast!

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
